--- select_count_distinct.sql
select count(distinct x) from foo
--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []parser.SelectItem{
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.CallExpr{
          end:  24,
          Func: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  7,
            end:  12,
            Name: "count",
          },
          Distinct: true,
          Args:     []*parser.Arg{
            &parser.Arg{
              pos:  22,
              Expr: &parser.Ident{
                pos:  22,
                end:  23,
                Name: "x",
              },
              IntervalUnit: (*parser.Ident)(nil),
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
    From: &parser.From{
      pos:    25,
      Source: &parser.TableName{
        Table: &parser.Ident{
          pos:  30,
          end:  33,
          Name: "foo",
        },
        Hint:   (*parser.Hint)(nil),
        As:     (*parser.AsAlias)(nil),
        Sample: (*parser.TableSample)(nil),
      },
    },
    Where:   (*parser.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*parser.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*parser.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*parser.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT count(DISTINCT x) FROM foo
